meanings.definition: A dessert typically consisting of ice cream topped with syrup, fruit, nuts, whipped cream, etc.
meanings.sent1: I love to treat myself to a sundae on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream shop offers a variety of sundaes with different toppings.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone enjoyed building their own sundae bar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sundae, sweet and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The sundae melted in the sun, creating a delicious mess.

meanings.definition: A dish or container in which a sundae is served.
meanings.sent1: The waiter brought over a fancy sundae for the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent2: The glass sundae dish sparkled under the lights of the ice cream parlor.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally dropped the sundae dish, causing a comical ice cream disaster.
meanings.sent4: The sundae dish gleamed like a precious gem on the table.
meanings.sent5: The delicate sundae dish shattered into pieces, ending the dessert dreams.
